title: Variables and Data Types
question: Create variables of different data types and display their types using typeof operator.
description: In this exercise, you'll learn about JavaScript's basic data types including string, number, boolean, undefined, and object.

testCases.expected:
String: string
Number: number
Boolean: boolean
Undefined: undefined
Object: object
testCases.description: Should correctly identify all data types

description: Practice working with arrays and for loops in JavaScript.
